title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Market size in million GBP, with a total of 8 data points.
Overall Market size in million GBP has increased over the Year.
Market size in million GBP is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
Max Market size in million GBP about 3489.0 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Market size in million GBP about 2407.0 was recorded at Year 2010
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Market size in million GBP with a total of 8 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is increasing which exists from 2017 to 2010.
